message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hey Alice, that's a bit steep for me.  I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $75.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can see that you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can sell it to you for $82.50
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $82.50 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  How about we split the difference and go with $80? That way we both get a fair deal.
